item.title: Longleat Safari Park
item.description:
[ad_1]

The Enchanting History of Longleat Safari Park

Nestled in the picturesque Wiltshire countryside, Longleat Safari Park is steeped in a fascinating history that dates back to the Elizabethan era. Originally the stately home of the Thynn family, Longleat House was completed in 1580 and is often hailed as one of the finest examples of Elizabethan architecture. The estateâ€™s transformation into a safari park in 1966 was a revolutionary concept for its time, marking a departure from traditional zoos and paving the way for a new model of animal conservation and public engagement.
